Comment:
Paved a paradise for a parking lot, cemented a playground for a theme park, covered a lake for a community, brought down nature for a glass facade.

Avik Ashar Now if we can create a oasis amidst this at every place, location, city, town, it will be one forward movement to give back what we have taken.
